title: EnzymeMLDocument
description: The EnzymeMLDocument is the root object that serves as a container for all components of an enzymatic experiment. It includes essential metadata about the document itself, such as its title and creation/modification dates, as well as references to related publications and databases. Additionally, it contains comprehensive information about the experimental setup, including reaction vessels, proteins, complexes, small molecules, reactions, measurements, equations, and parameters.

complexes.title: complexes
complexes.description: Contains descriptions of all complexes that are part of the experiment that may be referenced in reactions, measurements, and equations.

created.title: created
created.description: Date the EnzymeML Document was created.

creators.title: creators
creators.description: Contains descriptions of all authors that are part of the experiment.

equations.title: equations
equations.description: Contains descriptions of all equations that are part of the experiment.

measurements.title: measurements
measurements.description: Contains descriptions of all measurements that are part of the experiment.

modified.title: modified
modified.description: Date the EnzymeML Document was modified.

parameters.title: parameters
parameters.description: Contains descriptions of all parameters that are part of the experiment and may be used in equations.

proteins.title: proteins
proteins.description: Contains descriptions of all proteins that are part of the experiment that may be referenced in reactions, measurements, and equations.

reactions.title: reactions
reactions.description: Contains descriptions of all reactions that are part of the experiment.

references.title: references
references.description: Contains references to publications, databases, and arbitrary links to the web.

small_molecules.title: small_molecules
small_molecules.description: Contains descriptions of all reactants that are part of the experiment that may be referenced in reactions, measurements, and equations.

vessels.title: vessels
vessels.description: Contains descriptions of all vessels that are part of the experiment.

BaseUnit.title: BaseUnit
BaseUnit.description: Represents a base unit in the unit definition.

exponent.title: exponent
exponent.description: Exponent of the base unit in the unit definition.

kind.title: kind
kind.description: Kind of the base unit (e.g., meter, kilogram, second).

multiplier.title: multiplier
multiplier.description: Multiplier of the base unit in the unit definition.

scale.title: scale
scale.description: Scale of the base unit in the unit definition.

Complex.title: Complex
Complex.description: The Complex object allows the grouping of multiple species using their . This enables the representation of protein-small molecule complexes (e.g., enzyme-substrate complexes) as well as buffer or solvent mixtures (combinations of SmallMolecule species).

constant.title: constant
constant.description: Whether the concentration of the complex is constant through the experiment or not. Default is False.

participants.title: participants
participants.description: Array of IDs the complex contains

vessel_id.title: vessel_id
vessel_id.description: Unique identifier of the vessel this complex has been used in.

Creator.title: Creator
Creator.description: The Creator object represents an individual author or contributor who has participated in creating or modifying the EnzymeML Document. It captures essential personal information such as their name and contact details, allowing proper attribution and enabling communication with the document's creators.

family_name.title: family_name
family_name.description: Family name of the author or contributor.

given_name.title: given_name
given_name.description: Given name of the author or contributor.

mail.title: mail
mail.description: Email address of the author or contributor.

Equation.title: Equation
Equation.description: The Equation object describes a mathematical equation used to model parts of a reaction system.

equation.title: equation
equation.description: Mathematical expression of the equation. Represents the right hand side of the equation.

species_id.title: species_id
species_id.description: Identifier of a defined species (SmallMolecule, Protein, Complex). Represents the left hand side of the equation.

variables.title: variables
variables.description: List of variables that are part of the equation

Measurement.title: Measurement
Measurement.description: This object describes a single measurement, which includes time course data of any type defined in DataTypes. It contains initial concentrations and measurement data for all species involved in the experiment. Multiple measurements can be grouped together using the group_id field to indicate they are part of the same experimental series.

group_id.title: group_id
group_id.description: User-defined group ID to signal relationships between measurements.

species_data.title: species_data
species_data.description: Measurement data of all species that were part of the measurement. A species refers to a Protein, Complex, or SmallMolecule.

temperature_unit.title: temperature_unit
temperature_unit.description: Unit of the temperature of the measurement.

MeasurementData.title: MeasurementData
MeasurementData.description: This object describes a single entity of a measurement, which corresponds to one species (Protein, Complex, SmallMolecule). It contains time course data for that species, including the initial amount, prepared amount, and measured data points over time. Endpoint data is treated as a time course data point with only one data point.

data_type.title: data_type
data_type.description: Type of data that was measured (e.g. concentration, absorbance, etc.)

data_unit.title: data_unit
data_unit.description: SI unit of the data that was measured.

initial.title: initial
initial.description: Initial amount of the measurement data. This must be the same as the first data point in the  array.

is_simulated.title: is_simulated
is_simulated.description: Whether or not the data has been generated by simulation. Default is False.

prepared.title: prepared
prepared.description: Amount of the the species before starting the measurement. This field can be used for specifying the prepared amount of a species in the reaction mix. Not to be confused with , specifying the concentration of a species at the first data point from the  array.

species_id.title: species_id
species_id.description: The identifier for the described reactant.

time_unit.title: time_unit
time_unit.description: Unit of the time points of the .

Parameter.title: Parameter
Parameter.description: This object describes parameters used in kinetic models, including estimated values, bounds, and associated uncertainties. Parameters can represent rate constants, binding constants, or other numerical values that appear in rate equations or other mathematical expressions.

constant.title: constant
constant.description: Specifies if this parameter is constant. Default is True.

initial_value.title: initial_value
initial_value.description: Initial value that was used for the parameter estimation.

lower_bound.title: lower_bound
lower_bound.description: Lower bound for the parameter value that was used for the parameter estimation

stderr.title: stderr
stderr.description: Standard error of the estimated parameter.

upper_bound.title: upper_bound
upper_bound.description: Upper bound for the parameter value that was used for the parameter estimation

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the estimated parameter.

Protein.title: Protein
Protein.description: The Protein object represents enzymes and other proteins involved in the experiment.

constant.title: constant
constant.description: Whether the concentration of the protein is constant through the experiment or not. Default is True.

id.title: id
id.description: Identifier of the protein, such as a UniProt ID, or a custom identifier.

organism.title: organism
organism.description: Expression host organism of the protein.

organism_tax_id.title: organism_tax_id
organism_tax_id.description: Taxonomy identifier of the expression host.

references.title: references
references.description: List of references to publications, database entries, etc. that describe or reference the protein.

sequence.title: sequence
sequence.description: Amino acid sequence of the protein

vessel_id.title: vessel_id
vessel_id.description: Identifier of the vessel this protein has been applied to.

Reaction.title: Reaction
Reaction.description: The Reaction object represents a chemical or enzymatic reaction and holds the different species and modifiers that are part of the reaction.

modifiers.title: modifiers
modifiers.description: List of reaction elements that are not part of the reaction but influence it.

reversible.title: reversible
reversible.description: Whether the reaction is reversible or irreversible. Default is False.

species.title: species
species.description: List of reaction elements that are part of the reaction.

ReactionElement.title: ReactionElement
ReactionElement.description: This object is part of the  object and describes a species (SmallMolecule, Protein, Complex) participating in the reaction. THE TYPE OF THE REACTION ELEMENT IS SPECIFIED IN THE TYPE FIELD. The stochiometry is of the species is specified in the  field, whereas negative values indicate that the species is a reactant and positive values indicate that the species is a product of the reaction.

species_id.title: species_id
species_id.description: Internal identifier to either a protein or reactant defined in the EnzymeML Document.

stoichiometry.title: stoichiometry
stoichiometry.description: Float number representing the associated stoichiometry. Negative values indicate that the species is a reactant and positive values indicate that the species is a product of the reaction.

SmallMolecule.title: SmallMolecule
SmallMolecule.description: The SmallMolecule object represents small chemical compounds that participate in the experiment as substrates, products, or modifiers. It captures key molecular identifiers like SMILES and InChI.

canonical_smiles.title: canonical_smiles
canonical_smiles.description: Canonical Simplified Molecular-Input Line-Entry System (SMILES) encoding of the small molecule.

constant.title: constant
constant.description: Whether the concentration of the small molecule is constant through the experiment or not. Default is False.

id.title: id
id.description: Identifier of the small molecule, such as a Pubchem ID, ChEBI ID, or a custom identifier.

inchi.title: inchi
inchi.description: International Chemical Identifier (InChI) encoding of the small molecule.

inchikey.title: inchikey
inchikey.description: Hashed International Chemical Identifier (InChIKey) encoding of the small molecule.

references.title: references
references.description: List of references to publications, database entries, etc. that describe or reference the small molecule.

vessel_id.title: vessel_id
vessel_id.description: Identifier of the vessel this small molecule has been used in.

UnitDefinition.title: UnitDefinition
UnitDefinition.description: Represents a unit definition that is based on the SI unit system.

base_units.title: base_units
base_units.description: Base units that define the unit.

id.title: id
id.description: Unique identifier of the unit definition.

name.title: name
name.description: Common name of the unit definition.

Variable.title: Variable
Variable.description: This object describes a variable that is part of an equation. Variables can represent species concentrations, time, or other quantities that appear in mathematical expressions. Each variable must have a unique identifier, name, and symbol that is used in equations.

Vessel.title: Vessel
Vessel.description: The Vessel object represents containers used to conduct experiments, such as reaction vessels, microplates, or bioreactors. It captures key properties like volume and whether the volume remains constant during the experiment.

constant.title: constant
constant.description: Whether the volume of the vessel is constant or not. Default is True.
